intro: Kneiffia, commonly known as the "flower of the desert," is a rare and striking plant native to arid regions of Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, known for its unique adaptations to harsh environments. The plant features succulent leaves and produces vibrant, star-shaped flowers in shades of red, orange, and yellow. Kneiffia thrives in well-drained soils and requires minimal water, making it well-suited for xerophytic habitats. Its blooming period typically occurs during the rainy season, adding a splash of color to the otherwise barren landscape.
